name: piabo public relations
tag_list: public-relations, communications, berlin, germany, europe, agency
overview:
We are an international boutique communication agency for the digital economy. Our mission: Strategic networking of PR, Social Media and business development. We are result driven communication experts and whith first rate experiences.

Our Clients (examples):

MyVideo.de | erento.com | Groupon.com | Last.fm | buyVIP | reputation.com

PiÃ¢bo is the leading agency for communication consultancy of businesses in the areas of internet, mobile/telecommunications and Greentech. The way our professional team works is pragmatic and efficient. We work very closely and at eye level with founders and CEOs and develop ideas, which correspond to the dynamic of the media and meet the pulse of multipliers. Besides classical public relations also personality PR, B2B communication, arrangement of media cooperations, SEO measures, initiation of contacts, the management of events and consultancy concerning the cooperation with media companies are part of our range of tasks. We accompany our clients strategically as well as operationally in the German speaking countries and internationally. Because of our access to more than 64.000 regularly cultivated journalist contacts in around 1.500 subject areas and our close personal contact to editorial offices and freelancers we offer an excellent basis for professional media work. Building upon that we have an extensive understanding of interests and dramaturgy to reach goals quickly and to touch emotionally. Every client benefits directly from our experience and knowledge. Because of our broad expertise we are able to not only see problems from the perspective of an agency, but also to consider the viewpoints of companies, journalists and target groups. We are helping also oure clients to expand to europe and find the right contacts etc.
